SHEEP_REALMS 发表于 2020-1-1 17:06
好，现在我遇到了新的问题

[17:09:21] [Server-Worker-1/WARN]: File minecraft:sounds/music/ark01.ogg does not exist, cannot add it to event 1:music.ark01

放到 assets\minecraft\sounds\music\ 里就有声了，我不知道为什么
